title: Compressed Air System Optimizer
description: Interactive workflow where students apply energy optimization strategies to a compressed air system — fixing leaks, reducing pressure, installing VFDs, recovering heat, and eliminating misuse — and observe the cumulative impact on energy consumption, cost, and CO2 emissions.
creator: Peter Vinck
subject: Compressed Air Systems
Energy Optimization
Fluid Power Systems
Industrial Energy Efficiency
Variable Frequency Drives
Leak Detection
Heat Recovery
CO2 Emissions
prerequisites: Basic understanding of compressed air systems
Familiarity with electrical power units (kW, kWh)
Understanding of operating costs and payback concepts
